title: Detailed Report Survey
description: Provide detailed information about an obstacle

Safely stand near to the crossing where the bridge is needed and record the GPS coordinates by tapping the button below.
Select the modes of transportation which people use at this location.
Which education destinations do people visit using this crossing?

Which health facilities do people visit using this crossing?
Are there any other destinations which were not listed above that people visit using this crossing?

What is the current crossing method?
